Spec

  • Validate File
    • checks to see if uploaded JSON file is the correct format
  • Tokenize
    • should be able to transform all words to lowercase and sort the words
    • should be able to remove every symbol and special character
  • createIndex
    • should return an Object
    • should not return an array
    • should have properties "alice" and "wonderland"
    • should not have properties "elie" and "justapose"
    • should return 0 for properties "alice" and "rabbit"
    • should return 1 for properties "alliance" and "hobbit"
    • should return undefined for properties "alanta" and "Honda"
  • storeIndex
    • should return an Object
    • should not return a string
    • should have properties "falls" and "hole"
    • should not have properties "minimal" and "sucks"
    • should return 0 for properties "into" and "of"
    • should return 1 for properties "lord" and "powerful"
    • should return undefined for properties "darklord" and "nothing"
  • getIndex
    • should return an Object
    • should not return an integer
    • should have properties "alice" and "wonderland"
    • should not have properties "eiie" and "justapose"
    • should return 0 for properties "alice" and "rabbit"
    • should return 1 for properties "alliance" and "hobbit"
    • should return undefined for properties "alanta" and "honda"
  • searchIndex
    • should return an array
    • should return 1 for search for "alice" in books
    • should return undefined for search for "anja" in books
    • should expect "hole" to be found when searching in "all"
    • should expect "debby" not to be found when searching in "all"
